website_summaries.verdict: Great product for thick, unruly hair that is hard to tame.
pros: Gives hair extra definition and texture
Flexible resins and vegetable-based conditioners add shine and moisture
Works well for many types of hair
cons: This product is best for thick hair and can leave thin hair looking greasy

customer_reviews.title: The best for thin hair
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many products to hold my thin/fine hair in place when styled and this is the best. looks natural, lasts all day, and is easy to apply. I don't buy anything else now.
customer_reviews.author: Citi-Zen

customer_reviews.title: best product for styling hair
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I have found for holding my hair when I style it. I have fine hair but ample amount which likes to lay flat on my head and now I'm able to style it and it stays. Great product and a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Texacali

customer_reviews.title: Not actually a wax, but it works just fine.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I used to get a salon wax that was actually waxy. That product is no longer available. This is more a paste. The directions call for applying to dry hair, but I never blow dry my hair, so I use it after towel drying, and it still does the job. Not bad! Doesn't take much, and my unruly hair cooperates, so I'm good!
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Carroll

customer_reviews.title: This product is thick but does the job
customer_reviews.text: This product is thick but does the job. I use it so that my hair stays put on a bun. Only set back is it can get on your hat/cap if you're wearing one after applying the product. Washes out very easily though. I have used it for years and like it very much. When applying, mix it with a little water and glides on perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Reyna Santillan

customer_reviews.title: My favorite hair  product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have used it for many years. It's perfect for short hair, if you want a piecey style without stiffness or a sticky feeling, and adds a glossy shine. It leaves your hair flexible and reworkable. You can use a little to add a bit of shine and tame down flyaways, or more for a bedhead look. Use sparingly at first, it's a finishing product, kind of like a pomade but thicker. Experiment to determine what's right for your look. It's my go-to product for my pixie cut. I've never been able to find anything else like it, so I hope they never stop making it!
customer_reviews.author: AllAboutMimi

customer_reviews.title: Paul Mitchell Products - Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: There was a product under the Paul Mitchell name that included their familiar scent of Tea Tree products. This one, alas, does not - however, the scent is pleasant like a mild version of Bijon cologne, which does not detract from the good quality of Wax Works. The scent is not intense and is not noticeable after grooming into the hair. My hair is quite grey and with a business cut, but this product does the trick in holding it in place and giving it a luster without a glossy look. Very nice product, which I've been using for a few years now. Buy it, you will like it.
customer_reviews.author: UT

customer_reviews.title: Good strong hair holding power.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help me manage my daughters cowlicks and ended up using it myself! I like it for when I have my hair up in a professional bun and I want to have no damaged hairs sticking out at my hairline. When used in moderation It does not leave a greasy feel/look either which I really like.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Molan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great to style and get rid of the flyaways! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not greasy for a hair wax product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years and will continue to do so. It holds and molds hair into place without it being sticky or waxy feeling. I have short hair and found it to be a wonderful style aid.
customer_reviews.author: FP

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE it. I use a tiny amount just to ...
customer_reviews.text: I finally ran out of this product that I got about a decade ago along with a haircut. I LOVE it. I use a tiny amount just to give some movement to my layers, and keep my hair from getting too "fluffy" and it works perfect. This never version seems to be a little less thick than my original one, which I appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: K. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Got it quick.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years. Needed it fast and prime came through. Giant tube. Decent value.
customer_reviews.author: A. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: You Get A Lot For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is a huge tube of hair-styling wax for the money. The tube I bought from my hair salon was about half this size and they don’t carry it anymore, so this is definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Bear

customer_reviews.title: Not strong hold
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hold my sons flip up like we purchased it for. I use it for taming flyaways and frizz and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use it for work and it looks great. Those who complained about it being too oily ...
customer_reviews.text: You only need a little bit of this stuff and it lasts all day. I use it for work and it looks great. Those who complained about it being too oily are using too much of the product most likely. Overall looks great and holds very well. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Arlen S.

customer_reviews.title: I like the consistency and that it worked in my super ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the consistency and that it worked in my super strong hair, to give it some control. It took longer than expected to be shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Ann

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my culy hair from getting frizzy with out making it oily. Love this product. Used it many years
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to replace Slick Works. This was recommended. It is awful! Thick, greasy, and made a mess of my hair! I returned it. I don't understand why PM removes a product that worked for one that don't.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine C.

customer_reviews.title: Only thing I use in my hair
customer_reviews.text: Used this for years ,not always in salon so bought from amazon
customer_reviews.author: Swiss Miss

customer_reviews.title: Work Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this off Amazon due to Walmart not having it in stock where we are located. It works great compared to the one's we would get at walmart!
customer_reviews.author: Ria

customer_reviews.title: I just love it! Great way to style your hair
customer_reviews.text: Hoping and praying they never discontinue this product. I just love it! Great way to style your hair!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Scott

customer_reviews.title: Stays Put, Doesn't Flake
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this & he likes it because it doesn't make his hair sticky, it doesn't flake, and it washes out easily.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: It works great and keeps my short hair in place.
customer_reviews.text: My hair is so fine and flies all over the place. This product is terrific. When I travel it is no longer a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wax Works is the real deal
customer_reviews.text: Wax Works is the real deal. Great hold / not oily with a nice clean scent. Been around for at least 30 years and with good reason.
customer_reviews.author: xjandgs

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff for styling short, straight, thick hair. A little dab'l do ya!
customer_reviews.author: urwrstnitemare

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for years and always will. I don't need much but it's great for texture and shine on my short hair cut.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Finally ran out of my old tube...
customer_reviews.text: ...and couldn't find a store/salon that carried it. Seems a bit expensive, but lasts forever, so actually a great deal. Received item on time and as described.
customer_reviews.author: JR M.

customer_reviews.title: Best Styling Gel ever.
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and keeps the style all day without being stiff or heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L.

customer_reviews.title: Best Hair Product
customer_reviews.text: I recently decided to get a new hair style. I purchased the Paul Mitchell Wax Works for my new hair style. This is the best hair product ever. I only need to use a little and massage it into my hair. Then I pick up the hair using my fingers. It works wonders for the new hair style. It keeps my hair soft. I just love the product and I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Dreadful smell
customer_reviews.text: Dreadful smell. Smells like the strongest hair spray and doesn’t go away.
customer_reviews.author: CAL

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is the only place you can buy this stuff
customer_reviews.author: Half Baked

customer_reviews.title: Leaves hair soft and full
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product forever. It is the absolute best for short hair volume/texture!!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda B. Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. Gives body to fine hair. I like the Paul Mitchell spray wax a little better.
customer_reviews.author: JPS

customer_reviews.title: Fuzzy hair saver.
customer_reviews.text: Life saver. I wish I knew about this hair wax before I cut my long hair short because it was hard to manage. Now my hair looks so nice even though it’s short.

customer_reviews.title: Hair Care Extraordinaire
customer_reviews.text: This is okay I probably wouldn't purchase again you have to use a lot of it

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my hair, but my husband ended up using it and loving it!

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: So much bigger than the product I get at my hair salon and it definitely seems real ..good value

customer_reviews.title: Wax Works better then any other hair wax👨🏻
customer_reviews.text: This hair product works great. I had been searching for a hair gel that would last but not make my hair feel like it had been glued down. Wax Works solved the problem.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don 't know how I'd write a review for this other than to say......"it works".

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, use it all the time. It gives me the lift and fullness I like.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible for how its advertised
customer_reviews.text: Yeah! Wasn't what I expected! Very heavy on hair sticky very unpleasant wont ever by again! It's like putting honey in your hair!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years and love it as much now as when I first started using it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my thick coarse hair. Not for everyone

customer_reviews.title: Love it

customer_reviews.title: Very good if you want to spike your hair to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good if you want to spike your hair to the max. I find it works better when you hair is damp.

customer_reviews.title: A good hair product
customer_reviews.text: A good hair product. Great hold and shine. For me the only draw back is it needs to be applied on dry hair. I prefer hair products that can be applied on damp towel-dried hair. But otherwise does a good job!

customer_reviews.title: How to make your Hair look good.
customer_reviews.text: Paul Mitchell Wax Works can make your hair look very good.

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works good for me . I have thick curly dry hair, and any product that provides moisture is my friend! :)

customer_reviews.title: Be careful can use too much, try a dime size first especially on short hair.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for after drying my hair to spike it up abit.

customer_reviews.title: Only OK
customer_reviews.text: Seemed a little old...product was separated in the tube. After some mashing about in the tube, the liquid portion has dissipated, and the product is usable.

customer_reviews.title: Paul Mitchell Wax Works
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It helps in place of Shine.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I use it for my hair styling every day.

customer_reviews.title: I have used this product for about 5 years, ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for about 5 years, my hair is very thin and totally gray. This product works well with both shine and volume!

customer_reviews.title: ... hairdresser uses on my hair and it gives my fine hair more body and thickness
customer_reviews.text: This is what my hairdresser uses on my hair and it gives my fine hair more body and thickness.
customer_reviews.author: Joan S.

customer_reviews.title: Paul Mitchell Wax Works
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff-be careful and don't use to much. Not good for fine hair but great for my short gray hair. Nice and spiky. Wonderful stuff.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Did exactly what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Did exactly what I was hoping for. With natural curly hair sometimes It’s hard to find something that successfully lays down the ‘frizzies’!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Grethair product
customer_reviews.text: A small amount.goes a long way to keep my hair styled all day.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Have medium length wavy hair. Use this product daily before styling and it works great and no frizz. Would recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: only type i buy
customer_reviews.text: This product meets my needs perfectly. Hope it never goes away, as I'll have a hard time finding another product that works for me like this one.

customer_reviews.text: Shines and holds. No yucky build up. Can comb right through.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best hair wax ever, I use it every day - love it !!

customer_reviews.title: Broken cap
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. The lid was broke when I opened it😞

customer_reviews.title: Wax Works
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly what I normally buy in a barber shop. It is extremely convenient to have it on auto-ship.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works very good on my short hair. It keeps my hair always in place.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Where has this product been all my life. Keeps my hair manageable without being stiff. Love this product. Will buy again for sure

customer_reviews.title: unequivocably the best hair product ever
customer_reviews.text: Try it and you'll never go back to the old stuff. Way better than gel. You can restyle your hair throughout the day without losing the hold. You don't look like a wet head and it doesn't smell unpleasant like pomade.

customer_reviews.title: Just right for my short hair
customer_reviews.text: Just enough hold to make my short hair much more interesting (!) and washes off my hands easily. It is not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: JuliaR

customer_reviews.title: This is the best stuff.
customer_reviews.text: If you flat iron your hair or tie it back wet, when I flat iron my hair I use this on my palms and pin down the fly away baby hairs but you must get the extreme they kinda changed this product tho as it was really thick not the medium it was the strong one but it have a different name then extreme but it should be thick like tooth paste when you put it on your palms if its to dry you add a few drops of water then pin down it is great dries like gel but leaves a silky finish.
customer_reviews.author: Triple Moon Goddess 1111-YouTube

customer_reviews.title: No match to Slick Works
customer_reviews.text: Not happy the Slick Works is discontinued. Wax Works too heavy and no shine. No other product the same yet.
customer_reviews.author: Rosebud266

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful way to make your shine!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for many years and love it. It is convenient to be able to order it on-line from a reputable company. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this product so happy to find here @ discounted price...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This goes on well and stays for quite a while unlike other waxes

customer_reviews.title: Returned it was like a gel and not what I really
customer_reviews.text: Returned it was like a gel and not what I really wanted

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wax! It's not very flexible, but it tames hair and makes it manageable and shiny. Very good!
customer_reviews.author: HMCA

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: This product helps my hair to be managable. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: dh

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used
customer_reviews.text: Other hair wax left my hair with an odd feel and I couldnt get it styled the way I wanted. The Paul Mitchell Wax Works is gentle enough to work with in my hair and holds my style without being stiff. I dont have to wash it each day after sleeping and gettin a "bed head". It stills looks nice the 2nd day with just a touch up style.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Sonjia in Catonsville
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but the purchase price was not the same as the advertised price, it was actually higher. I was a little disappointed in that, but I purchased the product anyway and really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Sonjia

customer_reviews.title: Shipped fast and a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quick, though the price has gone up quite a bit recently. Amazon previously sold two for this price, now you just get one. Price and the convenience is still worth it though.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Loved how it was done at my hair salon...
customer_reviews.text: but it is not coming out as well when I do it myself at home. It is sticky, and pulls my hair style out of place when I put it on. It does dry soft, and shiney with great hold, but I just don't like the way my hair sticks to my hands when I put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2

customer_reviews.title: Great service for a great product!
customer_reviews.text: Recently I have had difficulty finding this product in salons and retail stores so was delighted to find this source. The delivery service was good.
customer_reviews.author: Zeona

customer_reviews.title: Toxic ingredients
customer_reviews.text: My husband has wild curly hair that needs taming and it helps but then we get crunchiness. It's thick and sticky. Hard to wash off hands. Then I looked at the ingredients and its packed with Parabens and all the other can Cancer causing ingredients. We will just have to keep looking for something with safe ingredients that will tame his hair.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: yuck
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is not for me .. sticky .. just a waste of money as it went in the trash

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years and it's a great product.

product_meta.title: Paul Mitchell Flexible Style Wax Works Gel, 6.8 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Get an extreme style and shine with Wax Works gel from Paul Mitchell. This high-definition hair gel creates bold texture and definition and makes hair super shiny. Flexible resins and vegetable-based conditioners add definition and texture. Strong enough for hair that's hard to control. Hair Type: Ideal for All Hair Types. Fragrance: Tranquil watery scent with hints of clean citrus, water lily and cooling eucalyptus. Stylist Tip: Apply a small amount for a piecey, controlled look.

BRAND STORY
Paul Mitchell is results-driven hair care from John Paul Mitchell Systems—the leader of salon-quality products committed to the professional beauty industry. Every purchase supports JPMS salons with a commission.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
